summary: This cable discusses the conclusion of a review of the ZRPRIMA program, which aimed to recruit Cuban technicians from Western Europe. The review found that the program had not achieved significant results due to failures in Cuban recruiting efforts. The cable recommends discontinuing intensive searches for ZRPRIMA candidates but suggests remaining alert for opportunities to place resident agents in Cuba.
title: RBRUMEN ZRPRIMA
recipient: LOND, PARI, BRUS, HAGU, COPE, STOC, OSLO, MADR, SOLE, FRAN, FROB, BORN, HAMB, BRUN, MUNI, VIEN, ATHE, BERN, GNVA, CALE, BEIR, TEHE, TELA, RIOD, SAOP, MRID, SAGO, MONT, BUEN, CARA, LAPA, LIMA, QUIT, QUAT, SHTO, NELS, HAVE, BELS, LISB, MILA, VLEO, TRIE
